synopsis.text: Human-Yoma hybrids, known as Claymores, are the only hope for humanity against the shape-shifting demons called Yoma, who feed on human flesh while disguised in human form. In a world where these monsters lurk in every corner, a secret society implants Yoma flesh into human women, creating powerful warriors capable of defeating the demons. These Claymores possess incredible strength, faster healing, and the ability to detect Yoma and other hybrids. The story follows Clare, a skilled and beautiful Claymore, as she battles the demons while trying to maintain her humanity. Alongside her is Raki, a young boy who has lost everything to the Yoma, and now accompanies Clare on her journey. As they travel from town to town, slaying the demons that plague the land, the pair uncovers the dark secrets of Clare's organization and the true nature of the Claymores. With every victory, Clare moves closer to her ultimate goal: seeking vengeance on the Yoma that destroyed her childhood.
